item.title: Artificial Intelligence Based Hospital Appointment System
item.description: The fact that some of the symptoms are related to many medical treatment areas causes patients to have difficulty in making an appointment for treatment. In this project, we design a data-driven system to find solution to this problem.

item.title: Practical Data Science over Nanoparticles
item.description: In this work, we analyse the correlations between structural and electronic properties of anatase, brookite and rutile phases TiO2 nanoparticles (NPs) using data science techniques. For this purpose, we use the geometries of three phases TiO2 NPs under heat treatment obtained from molecular dynamics (MD) simulations in the frame of DFTB+ code. We investigate the relationships among electronic properties of TiO2 and order parameter R or segregation phenomena & nearest number contacts n. In this architecture, the correlations among HOMO, LUMO, Energy gap (Eg), Fermi energy (Ef), R and n have been analyzed.
